annotations.description: A deep dive into the Gimlet and three recipes you can use to approach this drink, I think you'll like this one!I was surprised by what I found when I started...
annotations.title: The Gimlet, a Cure for Scurvy | How to Drink

textContent:
1.5 oz lime cordial
2 oz gin

Stir over ice
Strain into coupe

title: Gin Gimmlet
